name: Rogue Contracts: Syndicate
description: Be Stealthy. Be Fast. Be Tactical. Be Lethal.Enter a dark, dystopic world of advanced organized crime, and prepare to take on a highly militarized and dangerously ambitious syndicate.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or better Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 3.0 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GT 240 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
